name: Dirt Bike Motocross Wave Rally- JetSki Racing Game
name_original: Dirt Bike Motocross Wave Rally- JetSki Racing Game
description:
The Game you have never played before .!!!

Yes Dirt Bike Racing in high waves !!

One of the Most addictive Dirt Bike Surfing game on AppStore!

Feel as if you are on a Dirt Bike performing some crazy Stunts Under Water Waves !!

Surfing Dirt Bike gives you the thrilling experience of real surfing .

* Featuring incredible physics engine with animated rag doll physics.
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* 30 Exciting Levels
